title: log in issues
body: When I tried to Login to my main account today, i got a red message above username "You have tried logging in too many times in a short period of time. Please wait a while before retrying". So i wait a little and again the same. Afrer 3h i tried again, and again the same. I did the "Repair" and it didnt help, then i delete lol and instal it again, and even that didnt help, im getting the same answer "You have tried logging in too many times in a short period of time. Please wait a while before retrying". I tried even on oteher acc and again the same. Pls help

replies.body:
Hmmmmm it sounds like you might be getting locked out unintentionally, but let's be safe to make sure nothing was maliciously installed on your pc that's causing this. Make sure you first run some malware and spyware scans to protect your pc.

After that you should be able to use VPN temporarily to get logged in until those failed attempts fall off your account.
Try running the program as administrator
If not, try resetting your router. Could be an ip issue
